frontmatter.title: My Personal Website V2
frontmatter.blurb: This is the second iteration of my website. I streamlined the appearance significantly and removed some redundent aspects from the previous version. This site was done completely in CSS, HTML, jQuery, and Jekyll to ultimately keep it very simple. Feel free to use it as a template if you want (some parts of it are messy).

frontmatter.title: The Kodeability App Website
frontmatter.blurb: This was the first website I ever created to teach myself the basics of static web development (HTML, CSS) and basics of design (Typography, Images, Color Theory, Layouts); this site took me about 3 weeks to complete. It was initially made for an android app I was working on at the time, but the app sadly never saw the light of day. The links were not implemented, feel free to download and use the project as a template (attribution would be appreciated). (:

frontmatter.title: A Visual Gallery of My Personal Sites
frontmatter.blurb: The history of all the iterations of my personal site I have created.

frontmatter.title: A Tetris Remake
frontmatter.blurb: Tetris is one of the most influential games ever created, and one of my personal favorites (I am not very good at it). This was the second game I ever made. My objective for this game was to create it in as little time as possible (at most 5 days) with a unique implementation. This game took me 4 days non-stop to create, and was programmed in Java.

frontmatter.title: A Space Invaders Remake
frontmatter.blurb: This was the first video game I ever created. It is a infinite horde space shooter that heavily based off of Space Invaders. The objective in the game is to eliminate all enemy spaceships before you die. This game was created purely in Java.

frontmatter.title: A MongoDB Crash Course
frontmatter.blurb: A very quick intro into MongoDB.

frontmatter.title: My Personal Website V1
frontmatter.blurb: This is the irst iteration of my website. For years I wanted my own little place people could visit. A location, where I could showcase my work to the world. This was my first attempt at creating anything of subtance on my own.
